item.title: Search, Verify and Feedback: Towards Next Generation Post-training Paradigm of Foundation Models via Verifier Engineering
item.description: Verifier engineering: A new post-training paradigm for foundation models using automated verifiers to provide effective supervision signals, enhancing capabilities beyond traditional data-centric meth…
